6586949894210.title: KYRIE 7 CQ9326 300
6586949894210.body_html:
Kyrie Irving is a creative force on and off the court. He needs his shoes to keep up with his playmaking, but also sync with his boundary-pushing style and ethos. Tuned for the next generation of energy return, control and speed, the Kyrie 7 helps players at all levels take advantage of their quick first step by optimizing the shoe's fit, court feel and banking ability.

Play Contained
Mesh details wrap around your foot to create a close, comfortable fit that allows you to capitalize on your quickness. The laces feed through molded fins that pull down over your forefoot when you lace up.
Quick First Step
The large forefoot Air Zoom Turbo unit is curved to bend in multiple directions. It provides energy return for fast and responsive cornering.
Data-Informed Traction
The 360-degree, computer-generated traction pattern helps you stay in control and move in and out of cuts. The rubber wraps up along the inner foot to give you traction when pushing off your edges.
Padded collar feels supportive.

More Details
  • Thin, padded tongue
  • Molded "KI" logo on tongue
  • Embroidered Kyrie signature on heel
  • Inner tongue label

6586594754626.title: KYRIE LOW 4 CW3985 400
6586594754626.body_html:
Kyrie needs shoes that won't slow him down and help him connect to the court. The Kyrie Low 4 is stripped of all excess to keep it lean and lightweight while fully containing the foot and helping to eliminate movement inside the shoe. Cushlon foam and Zoom Air provide a smooth, responsive ride, and the data-informed traction keeps Kyrie low to the ground and in control.

Forefoot Containment
The laces feed through 2-pronged "fingers" in the forefoot. When you tighten the laces, the fingers pull down to help lock your foot in over the footbed.
Smooth Ride, Focused Responsiveness
Full-length Cushlon foam is soft, responsive and smooth when moving from heel to toe. A Zoom Air unit adds responsiveness to help focus your attack.
Data-Informed Traction
The rubber outsole uses a data-informed, computer-generated traction pattern. It's designed to help grip the court in multiple directions. The rubber wraps up the toe and sides to help you stay in control when banking hard on your edges.
Lean Design
Stripped of all unnecessary components, the shoe's overall frame is built to be light and lean but supportive precisely where it's needed.

More Details
  • Sleek, sculpted midsole has a fast, streamlined look.
  • Lightweight, grid-patterned mesh offers a secure, supportive fit.
  • Padded, contoured collar is higher in back to fit snugly around your Achilles tendon.

6586306986050.title: ACG MOUNTAIN FLY LOW DJ4030 001
6586306986050.body_html:
This isn't the shoe your parents hiked in. Just as at home in the city as it is in deserts, canyons, and on mountains, the Nike ACG Mountain Fly Low is ready for whatever you throw at it. It uses a sticky rubber outsole that brings crag-inspired traction. Soft React foam in the midsole delivers comfort whether you're walking the block or hopping rocks in Joshua Tree.

Pacific Northwest Tested
This product was designed and tested in Oregon, USA. The state's vast wilderness and climate has served as inspiration for our designs. To create this shoe, our team went to Smith Rock. It's a rock climber's playground in Central Oregon. The area helped the team connect with the environment and learn how it can inform our gear and how we use it.
Undeniable Comfort
Nike React technology is a lightweight, durable foam that delivers a smooth, responsive ride.
Stuck on Nature
The sticky rubber outsole has lugs that wrap onto the toe, creating a look that delivers traction and durability from the city to the trails.
Laces with webbing eyestays create a functional take on traditional lacing.
Low-cut collar and booty-like construction add ankle mobility and lasting comfort.
Reinforced rubber on toe for added durability.

More Details
  • Pull tabs for easy on and off
  • Reflective details
  • Not intended for use as Personal Protective Equipment (PP

6587509768258.title: AIR FORCE 1 EXPERIMENTAL CZ1526 200
6587509768258.body_html:
Share your style in the Nike Air Force 1 Experimental, the b-ball icon that puts a N354 spin on what you know best: stitched overlays, old-school details and the perfect amount of flash to make you shine. The cultural icon gets a vacuum-sealed treatment on the upper, creating a 1-of-a-kind finish, while blank areas invite you to add and show off your own art.

Playing with DIY style, the upper features areas to add your own art or signature while the to/from sticker that's included invites you to take ownership of your style.
The upper features a synthetic, molded foam that is vacuumed-sealed, creating a truly 1-of-a-kind look. The repeating "Air Force 1" on the transparent skin nods to courier services.
Open foam tongue adds to the DIY appearance.
The drawstring with lace toggle lace system lets you easily adjust your comfort and fit on the go.
Originally designed for performance hoops, Nike Air cushioning adds lightweight, all-day comfort.
The padded, low-cut collar adds a clean look that feels great.

More Details
  • Pull tabs
  • Sticker in box can be applied to the shoe

6587402715202.title: JORDAN ZION 1 DA3130 002
6587402715202.body_html:
With a down-to-earth persona and abilities that are out of this world, Zion is unlike anybody else. On court, the gentle spirit who's all about family transforms into an unmatched force of unstoppable athleticism and speed. The Zion 1 kicks off his signature line with a design inspired by his duality of humility meets superhuman ability. Full-length Air Strobel cushioning is stacked with a Zoom Air unit in the forefoot—a sensational mix of plush underfoot comfort and rapid responsiveness. It's light, stable and strong, with aggressive traction to help Zion grip the court and control his power.

Full-Length, Responsive Air
A full-length Air Strobel unit is stitched directly to the upper, sitting right under your foot for a cloud-like feel. An energy-returning Zoom Air unit is stacked underneath the forefoot to add an extra burst of responsiveness.
Locked-In to Step Out
A 2-loop band helps keep you secure each time you lace up, while higher sidewalls provide the utmost side-to-side stability.
A Different Type of Speed
A multidirectional outsole pattern provides stop-and-go traction for players who stay on their toes.
Plush Comfort Without the Weight
A dynamic, flexible tongue includes targeted padding over the top to ease lace pressure and to provide plush comfort without added weight.

4787326124098.title: ZOOM FREAK 2 CK5424 006
4787326124098.body_html:
As a rookie Giannis wasn’t just new to the league, he was new to the country. Unfamiliar with the ins and outs of Milwaukee, sometimes he had to improvise. There’s a fun story from Giannis’ first year in the league: He was late for practice but wasn’t sure how to call a taxi, so he started to run. On his way, a lucky fan recognized the 7-footer heeling it down the sidewalk and offered him a ride to the practice facility. This version of the Freak 2 plays on this tall tale with black/grey dominate colors accented with crimson and gold and a metallic silver Swoosh.

A New Breed of Speed and Power
The combination of Zoom Air cushioning in the forefoot and soft, responsive foam helps you harness your power to speed down the court.
Stable Euro Steps
A molded TPU piece on the outer front is designed for one of Giannis' most effective moves. It helps contain and stabilize the foot through the Euro step motion.
Lightweight and Flexible
The outsole rubber is separated into 2 areas with a rigid, supportive piece in between. This helps reduce weight and improves flexibility.
The names of Giannis and his 4 brothers (Alex, Francis, Thanasis and Kostas) are molded into the outsole.
Heel strap helps you pull on the shoe.
"I am my father's legacy" is printed on the insole.

More Details
  • "Freak" engraved in the midsole foam
  • "Freak" Swoosh design on tongue
  • Traditional tongue and lace construction
  • Asymmetrical lace feeds

6554389872706.title: JORDAN 6 RINGS DD5077 107
6554389872706.body_html:
The Jordan 6-Rings incorporates key features from each shoe that MJ wore while stacking up the Championship rings for Chicago. Celebrate the history of Jordan with this hybrid design that takes its cues from six legendary Jordan shoe styles.
  • Full-grain leather, synthetic leather and engineered mesh upper, with details like the lacelock and heel loop from the Jordan VI, a huarache-style inner sock from the Jordan VII and a fuzzy tongue logo and adjustable strap from the Jordan VIII.
  • Midsole, a full-length Phylon™ unit with Zoom Air™ in the heel and forefoot, was inspired by the Jordan XIII.
  • Entire upper silhouette gets its design from the Jordan XI while the "TWO3" script on the tongue and metal lace loops on top are taken from the Jordan XII.
  • Outsole is a combination of solid and clear rubber, which created performance traction with superior style.
  • Mid.

4745648341058.body_html:
The Nike Air Max 90 Surplus adds soldier style to the track classic with large rubber lugs, tough overlays and durable TPU accents. Military-inspired colors combine with the composite toe cap (think hardcore work boots) and an internal stash pocket on the gusseted tongue. Winter or not, here you come.

Workwear Inspired
Forged from heavy-duty materials like its tough overlays and tactical mudguard, it merges everyday utility with style. Round laces tie the look together.
Winter Traction
Inspired by workwear, the rubber Waffle-inspired outsole features large lugs for added traction.
Winning Details
From the round laces to the stash pocket in the tongue to the rubberized "90 SURPLUS" logo, it adds the perfect details to the tried and true classic. The gusseted tongue lets you mix up how you wear them while military inspired colors add the finishing touch.
Originally designed for performance running, the Max Air unit adds unbelievable cushioning.
The low-top design combines with a padded collar for a sleek look that feels soft and comfortable.
The rubber Waffle-inspired outsole design adds a heritage look, traction and durability.
The stitched overlays and TPU accents add durability, comfort and the iconic '90s look you love.
The foam midsole adds cushioning that lasts.
2 pull tabs add easy on and off while one aids with opening your stash pocket.

Mitchell & Ness Swingman jerseys are a staple for any die hard sports fan. Bring back the memories of your favorite retired player with Mitchell & Ness. Even if you're not a Chicago Bulls fan, pay homage to an NBA legend with this jersey.

6579775766594.title: NIKE OFFLINE 2.0 CZ0332 002

Reflective detailing across the shroud deliver functional use, while the robust, serrated sole unit proffers reliable comfort. Removable insoles round out the pair with a much-needed reminder in today’s age: “IT’S OKAY TO TAKE A BREAK”.

6584824627266.body_html: Pleasures has long been under the watch of Reebok, but that is soon to change with the brand’s very first adidas collab: a blacked out, punk take on the beloved Superstar. The pair masks its edge with relative simplicity. Black neutrals wrap the majority of the construction, dressing both the leathers throughout as well as the canvas trims. And while the PLEASURES name is spelled out multiple times in red, it’s but a subtle touch next to the aforementioned as well as the silver metallic stripes. Moreover, further use of the label’s logo dresses the partially see-through outsole and excessive accessories hang along the side of the shoe.

6584409817154.title: NIKE ACG WAIST BAG DD3390-010
6584409817154.body_html:
Durable and tough, the Nike ACG Karst Bag is your go-to bag for quick trips. Zippered compartments secure your essentials, while an adjustable hip belt helps you personalize the fit. Its daisy-chain webbing lets you easily clip extra items.

Northwest Tested, Big Island Inspired
This product was designed and tested in Oregon, USA. For inspiration, ACG went to the big island of Hawaii, where black sands and big waves make the area ripe for adventure. The island’s volcanic landscape and warm climate served as inspiration for the collection’s look and purpose.
Black Sands Camo
An allover camo pattern shows off the topography of the Hawaii's volcanic regions.
Easy Storage
Zippered compartments let you store essentials like your keys, wallet or phone. Daisy-chain loops around the front let you clip your gear.
Find Your Fit
The lightweight, durable design features an adjustable strap so you can customize your fit on the trail.
On-the-Go Comfort
A padded back panel feels cushioned and comfortable.

More Details

  • Spot clean
  • Imported

6584477155394.title: AIR MORE UPTEMPO '96 921948 102
6584477155394.body_html:
The Nike Air More Uptempo '96 brings OG basketball back to the streets. It features '90s graffiti-styled graphics alongside visible full-length Air cushioning. Elastic straps over the tongue keep your style sharp whether you rock them laced or unlaced. The throwback, chunky design combines with of-era over branding for a look that will never fade.

The oversized '90s graffiti-styled branding celebrates the streets you walk and the Air you walk on.
Originally designed for performance hoops, the Max Air units add lightweight, durable cushioning.
Returning to OG materials, it features velvety leather and super airy mesh.
Elastic straps run across the top of the foot, letting you wear your sneakers without lacing up.
Synthetic leather underlays add dimension beneath the iconic "AIR" lettering.
The round laces match the round pull tabs for added style points while making it easy to lace up and take on and off.

6584481480770.title: KYRIE 7 CQ9326 005
6584481480770.body_html:
Kyrie Irving is a creative force on and off the court. He needs his shoes to keep up with his playmaking, but also sync with his boundary-pushing style and ethos. Tuned for the next generation of energy return, control and speed, the Kyrie 7 helps players at all levels take advantage of their quick first step by optimizing the shoe's fit, court feel and banking ability.

Play Contained
Mesh details wrap around your foot to create a close, comfortable fit that allows you to capitalize on your quickness. The laces feed through molded fins that pull down over your forefoot when you lace up.
Quick First Step
The large forefoot Air Zoom Turbo unit is curved to bend in multiple directions. It provides energy return for fast and responsive cornering.
Data-Informed Traction
The 360-degree, computer-generated traction pattern helps you stay in control and move in and out of cuts. The rubber wraps up along the inner foot to give you traction when pushing off your edges.
Padded collar feels supportive.

More Details
  • Thin, padded tongue
  • Molded "KI" logo on tongue
  • Embroidered Kyrie signature on heel
  • Inner tongue label

6584494096450.title: AIR VAPORMAX EVO CT2868 003
6584494096450.body_html:
The Nike Air VaporMax EVO puts Air Max DNA under the microscope to showcase the distinguishing features of 7 Nike icons. From stitched overlays, to classic accents to unbelievable comfort and overt '90s styling, it splices the must-haves of your favorite Air Max shoes onto 1 new design. Evolve your look and feel the comfort of everything Max.

Everything to the Max
Taking elements from generations of Air Max, including the 90, 93, 96, Air Max Plus, Tuned 99, Solas and 180+, the Evo merges history with innovation and lets you bring the best of the past into the present.
The Future Maximized
Originally designed for performance running, VaporMax cushioning provides lightweight, full-foot cushioning. With unbelievably responsiveness, it's comfort and head-turning style all wrapped into 1.
Upper blends synthetics and mesh for lightweight, breathable comfort that lasts.
Strategically placed rubber pods on the outsole add multi-surface traction and durability.
Plush foam midsole offers responsive cushioning that feels soft and comfortable.
New EVO logo combines details that nod to all 7 Air Max styles for a modern look that pays tribute to the icons of Air Max.
Iconic "Whale Tail" shank from the Air Max Plus is positioned further back to add support while honoring the original beach-inspired design.

More Details
  • Pull tab on heel
  • Not intended for use as Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)

6584475713602.title: LEBRON XVIII LOW CV7562 100
6584475713602.body_html:
LeBron's high-performance engine needs a light yet strong frame to help harness and direct his force. The LeBron 18 Low brings back the 17's cushioning system to provide an optimal balance of comfort, impact cushioning and responsiveness. The upper combines a mix of lightweight materials, no-sew overlays and a structured heel to provide full-foot containment without sacrificing ankle mobility.

Impact Cushioning and Responsiveness
A Max Air unit under the heel provides impact cushioning for big, strong players like LeBron. It's paired with full-length Nike React technology for smooth transitions and responsiveness.
Lightweight, Durable Materials
Woven material in the upper is lightweight and durable. Overlays provide structure and support.
Heel Lock-In
The external molded heel clip provides lightweight support to help lock in the back of your foot.

More Details

  • No-sew overlays
  • Padded collar
  • Rubber outsole with diamond cutouts

The super-airy FlyKnit upper features a linen-like texture while the speckled Crater foam midsole adds a modern twist. It's legendary style that's on-point and lets you give a little back with every step.

Made with at least 20% recycled material by weight, the design is a part of Nike's commitment to help protect the future of sport.
Airy FlyKnit upper features recycled fabric that stretches to fit your foot while its linen-like appearance matches your summertime vibe.
Supersoft Crater foam is a revolution in comfort. It's made from recycled materials, adds spring to your step and features the OG cupsole design but with deeper grooves for a modern look.
Originally designed for performance hoops, Nike Air cushioning adds lightweight, all-day comfort.
Padded, low-cut collar looks sporty and feels great.

4750264139842.title: OUT OF THE BOX - THE RISE OF SNEAKER CULTURE - BCB-0847946601
4750264139842.body_html:
A groundbreaking traveling exhibition, Out of the Box showcases sneakers, from the mid-nineteenth century to sports performance breakthroughs, to present-day cultural icons. ﻿Drawn from the collection of the Bata Shoe Museum and significant private collectors, museums, and archives—including adidas AG, Converse Archives, Kosow Sneaker Museum, Nike Archives, Northampton Museums and Art Gallery, and Reebok Archives—this selection is richly contextualized with interviews and essays by design innovators, sneaker collectors, and cultural historians, creating a backdrop of the technical innovation, fashion trends, social history, and marketing campaigns that shaped the form over the past two centuries. 
Out of the Box includes sneakers ranging from an 1860 spiked running shoe, a pair of 1936 track shoes, Air Jordans I–XX3, the original Air Force 1, and early Adidas Superstars to contemporary sneakers by prominent figures including Damien Hirst, Jeremy Scott, Jeff Staple, and Kanye West. The book also highlights sneakers and prototype drawings that span the career of Nike sneaker design legend Tinker Hatfield, making this the definitive illustrated history of sneaker culture.
